definition: Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
Anding district of Dingxi city 定西市[Ding4 xi1 shi4], Gansu
Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: We have achieved genuine stability and unity.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經實現了安定團結。

sentences.english: Do not do anything that might upset social stability.
sentences.chinese: 不要做可能顛覆社會的安定任何事。

sentences.english: Shakedown analysis is an important part of the structural design or the research on load-bearing capacity.
sentences.chinese: 安定分析是結構設計或承載能力研究的一個重要方面。

sentences.english: The mechanism of shakedown was studied by using dislocation theory.
sentences.chinese: 並用位錯理論對其安定機理做了初步分析。

sentences.english: In control group, the patients were treated with oral valium.
sentences.chinese: 對照組以口服安定片治療。

sentences.english: The source of pipe line secondary stress check condition is the stability condition.
sentences.chinese: 管道二次應力校覈條件來源於結構的安定性條件。

sentences.english: Be settled, have a career that's going to be steady.
sentences.chinese: 安定下來，有一份穩定的工作。

sentences.english: I'm going to set it, do it the right way.
sentences.chinese: 我會安定下來，然後按正確的方法行事。

sentences.english: It is 10 times more effective than Valium.
There are signs of political unrests in the country.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家有不安定的跡象。

sentences.english: Section 48 contains the auxiliary power unit(APU) and horizontal stabilizer truss.
sentences.chinese: 48部分包括輔助動力裝置和水平安定面桁架。

sentences.english: As a result, the stability of the county began to peace.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，安定郡開始太平起來。

sentences.english: In ancient times Xi’an was called Chang’an, which means, literally, long lasting peace and security. The city witnessed many major events in China’s history.
sentences.chinese: 西安古名爲長安，字面意思爲“長久的和平與安定”。

sentences.english: The government tried to remit the urban residents into stability.
sentences.chinese: 政府力圖使城鎮居民恢復安定生活。

sentences.english: Smooth endmill surface reduces welding and realizes the stable machining.
sentences.chinese: 高品質的光滑表面降低了粘刀現象，實現了安定加工。

sentences.english: Approximately 100 million prescriptions for Valium and Librium are filled annually in the United States alone!
sentences.chinese: 僅僅在美國，關於安定和利眠定的處方就有將近一億。
